articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
​Another batch of new strains have been entered, and we're curious to see how many you've tried! We've got new Girl Scout Cookie hybrids for the Cookie lovers and Spartan warlord-themed sativas for fans of brutality ripped dudes in capes. Even more new varieties can be found in the Leafly Explorer (remember: you can sort by newest or you can use our strain filters to select from custom effects, flavors, and benefits).
All right, strain hunters — go forth, explore, and document your adventures in a strain review!
 
 1. Motavation
Characteristics of Motavation:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Sensi Star and Warlock
Sweet, fruity, and floral aroma
Heavy and relaxing with some creativity
May help with anxiety, muscle spasms, pain, and insomnia

 
 2. Leonidas
Characteristics of Leonidas:

Mostly sativa strain
Super Silver Haze variation produced by Canadian LP Tweed
Cross between Haze, Skunk #1, and Northern Lights
Happy, focused effects
Sour citrus aroma
May help with depression, fatigue, and stress

 
 3. Blue Cookies
Characteristics of Blue Cookies:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Blueberry
Sweet berry and cherry aroma
Intense cerebral euphoria coupled with full-body relaxation

 
 4. Nova
Characteristics of Nova:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Canadian LP Tweed’s version of Pennywise
Sweet woody and spicy pepper aroma
Relaxed and focused effects
May help treat pain, anxiety, inflammation, and stress disorders

 
 5. Bogart
Characteristics of Bogart:

Hybrid strain
A rendition of OG Kush distributed by Canadian LP Tweed 
Earthy, woody pine aroma
Suitable for consumers with a high tolerance
May help with PTSD, nausea, pain, and stress.

 
 6. Super Bud
Characteristics of Super Bud:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Big Bud and Skunk
Sweet, fruity aroma
Heavily relaxing effects

 
 7. Sunshine
Characteristics of Sunshine:

Sativa-dominant strain
Produced by the Canadian LP Peace Naturals Project
Sweet fruity and citrus flavors
Blissful, happy, uplifted effects
May help treat pain, nausea, and appetite loss
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Motavation, Leonidas, Blue Cookies, Bogart, and More

description: Leonidas is a Super Silver Haze variation produced by Canadian LP Tweed. With genetic roots stemming from Haze, Skunk #1, and Northern Lights, this sativa-dominant strain lifts you into a state of unencumbered happiness and focus. Citrus flavors mingle with a sweet and sour bite inherited from Leonidas’ Skunk ancestor, providing a flavorful precursor to the weightless euphoria to come. Like the Spartan warlord this strain was named after, Leonidas delivers a swift kick to depression, fatigue, and stress and sends them down a bottomless black pit.
descriptionPlain: Leonidas is a Super Silver Haze variation produced by Canadian LP Tweed. With genetic roots stemming from Haze, Skunk #1, and Northern Lights, this sativa-dominant strain lifts you into a state of unencumbered happiness and focus. Citrus flavors mingle with a sweet and sour bite inherited from Leonidas’ Skunk ancestor, providing a flavorful precursor to the weightless euphoria to come. Like the Spartan warlord this strain was named after, Leonidas delivers a swift kick to depression, fatigue, and stress and sends them down a bottomless black pit.

growInfo.growNotes:
Grows best outdoors in equatorial regions between 35 degrees latitude north and south.
	Ideal for screen of green (SCROG) and low stress training (LST) methods. Sea of green (SOG) only recommended for growers skilled in height management.

highlightedReviews.text: Leonidas is a great tasting, uplifting strain I use for depression, insomnia.

i have picked this up as wax at my local shop a couple of times and it is amazing it helps with my daytime ptsd and i want to be active all day. Wonderful strain i would love to be able to grow my own.

name: Leonidas
